[[tab old]]
Yo! So as well as writing, I like to draw! Here are some of shit quality drawings. And by that, I mean most of them have shit lighting. And most of them aren’t finished.

[[collapsible hideLocation="both" show="Favs" hide="This took a while"]]
[[image UnknownSkips width="550px" style="border:1px solid #665731;" title="quotetext"]]
[[/Collapsible]]

[[collapsible hideLocation="both" show="Kondraki" hide="King of the booterflies"]]
[[image Kondraki width="550px" style="border:1px solid #665731;" title="quotetext"]]
[[/Collapsible]]

[[collapsible hideLocation="both" show="Iceberg" hide="MySpace ©2003"]]
[[image Iceberg width="550px" style="border:1px solid #665731;" title="quotetext"]]
This was a piece I did to practice shading and lighting, and used Iceberg cause why not
[[/Collapsible]]

[[collapsible hideLocation="both" show="4640" hide="Josie"]]
[[image 4640 width="550px" style="border:1px solid #665731;" title="quotetext"]]
Thought this would be cute
Andrew is so great I love him he goes through shit he deserves better
[[/Collapsible]]

[[collapsible hideLocation="both" show="3001" hide="The best SCP"]]
[[image 3001 width="550px" style="border:1px solid #665731;" title="quotetext"]]
Red Reality is my absolute favorite SCP of all time. I just sketched this boi up, but I plan on doing a full piece representing the SCP at some point.
[[/Collapsible]]

[[collapsible hideLocation="both" show="4205" hide="I kept forcing my friends to read this"]]
[[image 4205 width="550px" style="border:1px solid #665731;" title="quotetext"]]
I just love 4205. It’s sooooooooo good. I need to digitalize this.
[[/Collapsible]]

[[collapsible hideLocation="both" show="Gerald" hide="He deserves better"]]
[[image Gerald width="550px" style="border:1px solid #665731;" title="quotetext"]]
This was an experiment with a kinda au thing where Gerald got around 2295, that’s why there are so many patches on him haha. And I drew him with a cane, because the dude’s been injured over 64 times.
[[/Collapsible]]

[[collapsible hideLocation="both" show="SCP-4972" hide="Idk what but something is wrong dude"]]
[[image SomethingIsWrong width="550px" style="border:1px solid #665731;" title="quotetext"]]
So I actually helped critique this article and when I read it I was like dude you gotta post this seriously everything about it is awesome from the title to the test logs like idk I just love it
[[/Collapsible]]

[[collapsible hideLocation="both" show="Researcher Crane" hide=";;"]]
[[image MyBoy width="550px" style="border:1px solid #665731;" title="quotetext"]]

I’ve drawn him before, but I wanted to do something nicer aha. This is my character Researcher Oliver Crane. He’s mentioned in a few of my SCPs, but his story and personality aren’t expanded upon.

I drew this because I wanted a drawing representing how Crane’s mind isn’t fully there always, as he’s got some really bad demons.

I’ve developed this character a lot and hardly used him rip. I need to write with him more.

Anyway, this portrait style drawing was fun to do. ^^
[[/Collapsible]]
